short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Validate decklists on jinteki.net and NetrunnerDB according to the CTZ MWL.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension provides an on-demand way to validate your decklists on jinteki.net and netrunnerdb.com according to the CTZ MWL (found at https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Xh4bB6rHembonYdBqN9sP8iW5ypWK0-5DImiqiGfMPk)

To use it, navigate to the edit page for your decklist ()and click the extension button in Chrome (usually to the right of the address bar). This will generate a small popup that either confirms that your decklist is valid, or if any problems are found it will list which cards make the deck invalid. Simply press Enter, Esc, or click `OK` to close the popup.
